title: Get home information
name: GetHome
description: Get user's home location

Success 200.description: User's home trace code (Logical Address). This would be wrapped up in QRcode.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{ status: true,
  data: 
   { trace_id: '537e2860cace54e137baee4a013bb653',
     location_ref: 
      { user_ref: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0ad',
        location_type: 'home',
        _id: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0ae',
        verify_change: '########',
        updated_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.325Z',
        created_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.325Z',
        enabled: true,
        speed: '',
        altitude_accuracy: '',
        altitude: '',
        gps: {
			longitude: '0',
			latitude: '0'
		},
        __v: 0 },
     user_ref: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0ad',
     _id: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0af',
     updated_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.340Z',
     created_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.340Z',
     enabled: true,
     address: '',
     city: '',
     nearby_trace_ids: [],
     __v: 0 } }

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:
Error-Response:

title: Update home information
name: PutHome
description:
Update the user's home location. Note that the request parameters must
contain either home or location or both.

Parameter.description: The home object containing only fields that should be updated
The location object containing only fields that should be updated

examples.title: Request-Example:
Request-Example:
Request-Example:
Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{ status: true,
  home: 
   { __v: 0,
     _id: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0af',
     location_ref: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0ae',
     trace_id: '537e2860cace54e137baee4a013bb653',
     user_ref: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0ad',
     updated_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.842Z',
     created_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.340Z',
     enabled: true,
     address: 'No. 2A Rukuba Road',
     city: 'Jos',
     nearby_trace_ids: [] },
  location: 
   { __v: 0,
     _id: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0ae',
     location_type: 'home',
     verify_change: '########',
     updated_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.853Z',
     created_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.325Z',
     enabled: true,
     speed: '3.4',
     altitude_accuracy: '5.5',
     altitude: '3.0',
     gps: {
			longitude: 4.3,
			latitude: 2.6
		} } }

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{ status: true,
  home: 'Not Updated',
  location: 
   { __v: 0,
     _id: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0ae',
     location_type: 'home',
     verify_change: '########',
     updated_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.731Z',
     created_at: '2015-07-25T16:44:55.325Z',
     enabled: true,
     speed: '2.6',
     altitude_accuracy: '1.0',
     altitude: '3.6',
     gps: {
			longitude: 4.3,
			latitude: 2.6
		} } }

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{ status: true,
  home: 
   { __v: 0,
     _id: '55b3bd0720343cc60f6ad0aa',

The name of the user who made the request

Represents the unique identifier of the creator.

title: Create a Target
name: PostMobileTarget
description: Create a Target in order to track Origin

Parameter.description: The Request ID (created by other user at POST /api/v1/mobile)
The name of the target. This would be shown to the user who would accept the request

examples.title: Request-Example:

Success 200.description: The name of the user who made the request (current user)
The Unique identifier of the user who made the request
Should be same as trace_id passed in the request

title: Get work information
name: GetWork
description: Get user's work location

Success 200.description: The name of company/organization the current user works
The nature of workplace, expressed in tags
User's work trace code (Logical Address). This would be wrapped up in QRcode.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{ status: true,
  data: 
   { trace_id: '05d5df35ae4e9644fd1905ae2d54f82a',
     location_ref: 
      { user_ref: '55b3cf2a61b97568152f1365',
        location_type: 'work',

title: Update work information
name: PutWork
description:
Update the user's work location. Note that the request parameters must
contain either work or location or both.

Parameter.description: The work object containing only fields that should be updated
The name of company/organization the current user works
User's current city where work place is
The location object containing only fields that should be updated
